title: New: A$AP Rocky – Celebration
content:
Earlier this evening BBC Sound of 2012 nominee A$AP Rocky dropped an unreleased track via his Twitter. Celebration finds him paraphrasing Kanye West, yet delivering in a raw, unabashed style similar to Lil Wayne. The production is slick and ready for the mainstream; fairly appropriate when you consider that he’ll be touring with Drake over the next few months. With the success of last years LiveLoveA$AP, the pressure is on for him to come up with the goods on his sophomore record. It’s unclear as to whether this new cut will feature on next months A$AP MOB.

A$AP Rocky – Celebration (Unreleased) by crackintheroad
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
